title: PiP- MLB.TV
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching MLB.TV on a device that is using Android 8 or above (PiP not available on lower Android versions. Mark as "Not-applicable" if testing on a device running Android version below 8)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the PiP system setting is enabled
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN show a "PiP" icon on the player window

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the PiP button is pressed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app should enter PiP mode

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the PiP system setting is enabled
AND the user leaves the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app should enter PiP mode
